name: OmniShoutmon

digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If this Digimon has ＜Save＞ in text, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 4000 DP or less.

name: Aldamon
effect:
[Hand] [Main] By placing 1 [Agunimon] and 1 [BurningGreymon]  from your trash under 1 of your [Takuya Kanbara]s in any order, digivolve into this card as if the Tamer is a level 4 red Digimon for the digivolution cost.
[On Deletion] Return 1 [Takuya Kanbara]  from your trash to your hand.

name: WarGrowlmon
effect: [When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 4000 DP or less. If no opponent's Digimon was deleted by this effect, you may digivolve this Digimon into a level 6 Digimon card with [Gallantmon] in its name in your hand for the digivolution cost. When this Digimon would digivolve with this effect, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
digivolveEffect: [End of Attack] [Once Per Turn] If your opponent has no Digimon in play, and this Digimon has [Growlmon] or [Gallantmon] in its name, gain 2 memory.

name: EmperorGreymon
effect:
＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card)[When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 6000 DP or less. If this Digimon has a red Tamer card in its digivolution cards, delete 1 of your opponent’s Digimon with DP less than or equal to this Digimon’s DP instead.
[On Deletion] You may play 1 [Takuya Kanbara]  from your hand or trash without paying the cost.

name: Gallantmon
effect:
＜Raid＞ (When this Digimon attacks, you may switch the target of attack to 1 of your opponent's unsuspended Digimon with the highest DP).
[When Digivolving] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 6000 DP or less.
[When Attacking] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 6000 DP or less. If no opponent's Digimon was deleted by this effect, trash the top card of your opponent's security stack.

name: Imperialdramon: Dragon Mode
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 3  from [Paildramon] or [Dinobeemon]
effect:
[When Digivolving] If this Digimon has a blue digivolution card, unsuspend this Digimon. If it has a green digivolution card, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
[End of Attack] You may digivolve this Digimon into a Digimon card with [Imperialdramon] in its name in your hand for its digivolution cost. When this Digimon would digivolve by this effect, reduce the digivolution cost by 2.

name: Imperialdramon: Fighter Mode
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 2  from [Imperialdramon: Dragon Mode]
effect:
[When Digivolving] Suspend all of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards. Then, return 1 of your opponent's suspended Digimon to its owner's hand. By returning 1 [Imperialdramon: Dragon Mode]  from this Digimon's digivolution cards to its owner's hand, place all of your opponent's suspended Digimon at the bottom of their owners' decks instead.
[All Turns] This Digimon gets +1000 DP for each color in its digivolution cards. While there are 2 or more colors in its digivolution cards, it gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) and ＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead).
